meanings.definition: A person or thing that ends something.
meanings.sent1: The movie's credits signaled the ender of the film.
meanings.sent2: The last puzzle piece was the ender of the jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The sneeze was the ender to the quiet library.
meanings.sent4: The final chapter was the ender of the thrilling book.
meanings.sent5: The closing ceremony was the grand ender of the event.

meanings.sent1: The dessert was the perfect ender to the meal.
meanings.sent2: The sunset marked the ender of the day.
meanings.sent3: The cherry on top was the sweet ender to the cake.
meanings.sent4: The last piece of the puzzle was the ender to the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The final scene was the emotional ender of the play.

meanings.definition: A game or match-winning point or shot.
meanings.sent1: The buzzer-beater was the game-winning ender.
meanings.sent2: The penalty kick was the ender of the match.
meanings.sent3: The home run was the exciting ender to the baseball game.
meanings.sent4: The match point was the decisive ender of the tennis match.
meanings.sent5: The three-pointer was the perfect ender to the basketball game.
